page.title: 19SOCIAL CONCERNS, PETWORTH NE
page.content: It is hardly surprising that in this fresh-air, pollution-free atmosphere, with outdoor occupations, the people are very healthy. If anyone does need the health services, where they go depends on which part of the area they live in. Some go to Petworth for a doctor, and at Kirdford a visiting doctor is available every Wednesday. All casualties go to St. Richards Hospital, Chichester. Medical treatment is given as part of the National Health Service, either free or at charges laid dowm by Statute, in the National Health Act. Dentists are at Midhurst or Petworth.
